document_data.name: YuYa Mao
document_data.mainbody: '''YuYa Mao''' was a [[Cat hengeyokai|cat]] [[hengeyokai]] adventurer in [[Shou Lung]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: YuYa Mao wandered the land, protecting a great number of small villages from any danger. She preferred put a stop to trouble swiftly and move on, so the folk she aided knew little about her.
document_data.Personality: She was curious but oddly aloof. When among humans for extended periods, she preferred to remain in the form of a stray [[Wikipedia:Siamese cat|Siamese]] [[cat]] playing pranks and pinching fish.
document_data.Relations: Around [[1357 DR]], YuYa was sometimes a companion of the [[tiger hengeyokai|tiger]] [[hengeyokai]] [[Hu (hengeyokai)|Hu]].
